010package imagingbook.common.interpolation;
011
012import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
013
014
015/**
016 * This interface defines the behavior of 2D pixel interpolators
017 * for scalar-valued images.
018 * 
019 * @author WB
020 */
021public interface PixelInterpolator {
022        
023        /**
024         * Enumeration type listing the most common interpolation methods.
025         */
026        public enum InterpolationMethod {
027                NearestNeighbor,
028                Bilinear,
029                Bicubic,
030                BicubicSmooth,
031                BicubicSharp,
032                CatmullRom,
033                CubicBSpline,
034                MitchellNetravali,
035                Lanzcos2,
036                Lanzcos3,
037                Lanzcos4;
038        }
039        
040        /**
041         * Returns a {@link PixelInterpolator} instance for the specififed
042         * {@link InterpolationMethod}.
043         * 
044         * @param method the interpolation method
045         * @return
046         */
047        public static PixelInterpolator create(InterpolationMethod method) {
048                switch (method) {
049                case NearestNeighbor :  return new NearestNeighborInterpolator();
050                case Bilinear :                 return new BilinearInterpolator();
051                case Bicubic :                  return new BicubicInterpolator(1.00);
052                case BicubicSmooth :    return new BicubicInterpolator(0.25);
053                case BicubicSharp :     return new BicubicInterpolator(1.75);
054                case CatmullRom:                return new CatmullRomInterpolator();
055                case CubicBSpline:              return new CubicBSplineInterpolator();
056                case MitchellNetravali: return new MitchellNetravaliInterpolator();
057                case Lanzcos2 :                 return new LanczosInterpolator(2);
058                case Lanzcos3 :                 return new LanczosInterpolator(3);
059                case Lanzcos4 :                 return new LanczosInterpolator(4);
060                //default : throw new IllegalArgumentException("unhandled interpolation method: " + method);
061                }
062                return null;
063        }
064        
065        /**
066         * Returns the interpolated pixel value for the specified position. 
067         * 
068         * @param ia a {@link ScalarAccessor} to the interpolated image
069         * @param x continuous interpolation position (horiz.)  
070         * @param y continuous interpolation position (vert.)  
071         * @return The interpolated pixel value at position (x,y).
072         */
073        public abstract float getInterpolatedValue(ScalarAccessor ia, double x, double y);
074        
075}
